entry.title: Diversity is desperately needed in IT
entry.summary: I want to start using this blog to get things off my chest related to how I see the state of IT today. Although I think it has greatly improved since when I started in IT, I believe that diversity in IT is needed. I get looks of surprise when I mention it to people, but once I begin to explain it, many people seem to quickly get it. Development in IT is dominated by White, Indian and Asian males. We really do not understand the experience that women, African Americans (male or female) and other races, genders, etc... go thru. Those people groups need their own representation in the industry.

entry.title: configured gh-pages!
entry.summary: I have set up this blog in the SadSumo GitHub pages. It was pretty straight forward. There were only a couple of gotchas.

entry.title: First Blog!
entry.summary: I am so excited to start a blog for SadSumo Studios. I plan to document what I learn in this blog. I hope also it is useful for others who encounter some of the same problems I have.
